improvement_suggestions: To avoid crashes and find more signatures, we should use wildcards in the hex patterns to match instruction sequences with variable opcodes. Specifically, replace `$pattern0` with `{ 8B C4 ?? ?? E8 ?? ?? ?? ?? }`, `$pattern1` with `{ 6A ?? ?? 5A 8B CE E8 ?? ?? ?? ?? 83 C4 ?? }`, and `$pattern2` with `{ 85 C0 ?? 0F 84 ?? ?? ?? ?? 8B 45 ?? }`.
